name: BTLO Challenge - Browser Forensics - Cryptominer
description: Our SOC alerted that there is some traffic related to crypto mining from a PC that was just joined to the network. The incident response team acted immediately, observed that the traffic is originating from browser applications. After collecting all key browser data using FTK Imager, it is your job to use the ad1 file to investigate the crypto mining activity.
author: Alvaro de Castro

questions.question: How many browser-profiles are present in Google Chrome?
Identify the Extension ID and Extension Name of the cryptominer
What is the description text of this extension?
What is the name of the specific javascript web miner used in the browser extension?
How many hashes is the crypto miner calculating per second?
What is the public key associated with this mining activity?
What is the URL of the official Twitter page of the javascript web miner?
